synopsis.text: Luo Lie, a young man from the modern world, is accidentally summoned to another world to live someone else's life. He finds himself in a treacherous situation where various factions vie for power and deception lurks around every corner. Relying on his tenacity and a mysterious ability gained during the soul transmigration, Luo Lie overcomes numerous trials and establishes a reputation for himself. However, greater dangers continue to emerge, threatening to destroy him. With the help of his childhood sweetheart, Luo Lie unwillingly embarks on a heroic path to face these threats, though he has no intention of becoming a hero. What awaits is either annihilation or triumph over adversity. In this mystical world of gods and demons, Luo Lie strives to uncover the truth and unveil the threats facing the land. His actions ripple through history, unraveling and reweaving the age-old Investiture of the Gods legend.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
